intro.dialog: Will you alter your fate today?
I can increase your potential motes and your highest scores.

intro.dialog_rand2: |wave|But try not to be too greedy.
intro.dialog_rand3: |wave|I can make this more difficult for you.

comment_alter.dialog: Make some sacrifices, and I will alter your fate.

comment_sacrifice.dialog: Your sacrifices will give me power.

comment_upgrade.dialog: I can use the power of |C3|Tetrids|C0| to alter your fate even further.

comment_max_level.dialog: My power has reached its limit.

comment_leave_none.dialog: I won't force you to change your fate.

comment_low_panic.dialog: You don't have enough panic for a worthy sacrifice.

comment_give_panic.dialog: I will take all of your |C3|panic attacks|C0| as a sacrifice.

comment_give_panic_high.dialog: You have a lot of |C3|panic attacks|C0| today.|L|I'll take all of them.

comment_panic_given.dialog: Doesn't it feel good to release all that panic?

comment_low_health.dialog: You don't have enough health for a worthy sacrifice.

comment_half_hp_error.dialog: Just give me your |C3|fortifying gifts|C0| instead.

comment_give_health.dialog: I will take |C3|half of your health bar|C0| as a sacrifice.

comment_give_health_high.dialog: Your health bar is very long today.|L|I think I'll take |C3|half|C0| of it.

comment_health_given.dialog: You didn't need that much anyways.

comment_cant_gifts.dialog: How about you sacrifice something else first?

comment_give_gifts.dialog: I'll take some of your gifts as a sacrifice.

comment_gifts.dialog: I have gifts that can alter your fate.

comment_no_gifts.dialog: I have nothing left for you.

comment_extra_battles_1.dialog: I can alter your fate by adding |C3|1 extra battle|C0| to your day.

comment_extra_battles.dialog: I can alter your fate by adding |C3|[VAL1] extra battles|C0| to your day.

comment_added_battles_1.dialog: Your fate has been altered with |C3|1 extra battle|C0| after you leave this place.

comment_added_battles.dialog: Your fate has been altered with |C3|[VAL1] extra battles|C0| after you leave this place.

comment_cant_add_battle.dialog: I need more power to do this.

panic_confirm.dialog: Give me all of your panics?

health_confirm.dialog: Give me half of your max health?

panics_given.dialog: Isn't it a relief to let go of all that panic?

a_lot_of_panics_given.dialog: Isn't it a relief to let go of all that panic?
What?     Were you expecting me to gain more power than this?
Aren't we being so greedy right now?
I bet you have a lot of |C3|panic gifts|C0| that just became perfect sacrifice fodder.

health_given.dialog: It won't matter if you never get hit.

battle_added.dialog_rand1: Your future has been shifted towards more battles and more love.
battle_added.dialog_rand2: You are now destined for even more encounters with monsters.
battle_added.dialog_rand3: There is more love in your future.|L||!|If you survive the extra battles.

battle_added.dialog_rand2: You are so powerful just for accepting the challenge.
battle_added.dialog_rand3: More monsters means more motes to extract.

comment_take_unknown.dialog: Take this at your own risk.

comment_take_karma.dialog: You got so many tetrids from gifts today.|L|I couldn't find enough to bring you myself.

comment_take_over.dialog: You must sacrifice more for this.

gift_taken.dialog_rand1: You have earned this through your sacrifice.
gift_taken.dialog_rand3: May fate roll in your favor.
gift_taken.dialog_rand4: You are in charge of your destiny.

tetrid_taken.dialog_rand2: |wave|Look at that pile of motes you have.

comment_give_traded.dialog: You already traded for this gift, and you are still willing to sacrifice it?

comment_give_panic_error.dialog: I will need to take all of your |C3|panic attacks|C0| before this can become a worthy sacrifice.

comment_give_rank_error.dialog: You have many |C3|Wonderful Gifts|C0| today.|L|Let's start with one of those.

comment_give_quick.dialog: This wouldn't be much of a sacrifice.

comment_give_starter.dialog: You are destined to keep this.|L|I can't take it.

gift_given.dialog_rand1: You might be making things harder for yourself.
gift_given.dialog_rand3: You probably didn't need that anyways.
gift_given.dialog_rand4: The rest of your day may become more difficult.
gift_given.dialog_rand7: Let's see how adaptable you've become.

comment_upgrade_power.dialog: I can alter your fate with |C3|[VAL1] Units of Power,|C0| but this can be increased with more tetrids

comment_upgrade_power_maxed.dialog: I can alter your fate with |C3|[VAL1] Units of Power|C0||L|This is my absolute limit.

comment_upgrade_quicks.dialog: I have |C3|[VAL1] Quick Gifts|C0| for you, but with some more tetrids I can always bring one more.

comment_upgrade_quicks_maxed.dialog: I will always have |C3|[VAL1] Quick Gifts|C0| for you to take from.

comment_upgrade_bonuses_0.dialog: With the power of tetrids, I will be able to bring a |C3|Bonus Gift|C0| for you.

comment_upgrade_bonuses_1.dialog: I have |C3|1 Bonus Gift|C0| for you, but with some more tetrids I can always bring another.

comment_upgrade_bonuses.dialog: I have |C3|[VAL1] Bonus Gifts|C0| for you, but with some more tetrids I can always bring one more.

comment_upgrade_bonuses_maxed.dialog: I will always have |C3|[VAL1] Bonus Gifts|C0| for you to take from.

comment_upgrade_tetrids_0.dialog: I can increase your score by bringing you a |C3|Tetrid Bonus Gift,|C0| but I will need a lot of tetrid power to do this.

comment_upgrade_tetrids_1.dialog: I have |C3|1 Tetrid Bonus Gift|C0| for you, but I can always bring another one.

comment_upgrade_tetrids.dialog: I have |C3|[VAL1] Tetrid Bonus Gifts|C0| for you, but I can always bring one more.

comment_upgrade_tetrids_maxed.dialog: I have |C3|[VAL1] Tetrid Bonus Gifts|C0| for you.|L|This is the limit of my power.

comment_upgrade_fail.dialog: You need to receive more |C3|Rose Medals|C0| from monsters, so that I may further alter your fate.

upgrade_power.dialog: I will be able to use more power to alter your day.
Think of how high your scores can become.

upgrade_quicks.dialog: I will bring you one more |C3|Quick Gift|C0| every day.
One of the many ways that I can alter your fate.

upgrade_bonuses_first.dialog: I will bring you a |C3|Bonus Gift|C0| next time.

upgrade_bonuses.dialog: I will bring you one more |C3|Bonus Gift|C0| every day.
You will have so many choices to alter your fate.

upgrade_tetrids_first.dialog: I will bring you a |C3|Tetrid Bonus Gift|C0| next time.
You will become a mountain of motes in no time.

upgrade_tetrids.dialog: I will bring you one more |C3|Tetrid Bonus Gift|C0| every day.
You will become a star of motes in no time.

green_comment.dialog: These feel so gross, or is that me?

yellow_comment.dialog: I don't even want to think about it.

blue_comment.dialog: Can I really help you with these?|L|What if I make your fate worse?

orange_comment.dialog: These feel like me, like broken glass.

purple_comment.dialog: Emptiness from The Void herself.|L||C3|These give me the most power.

radiant_comment.dialog: |shake|So much power!|norm||L|And yet, you handle it like it's nothing.

upgrade_confirm.dialog: Will you allow me to have these?

leave_warning.dialog: You gave me this power and you aren't going to make me use all of it?
You can't take it with you, you know?

leave_blank.dialog: There will be |wave|even more|norm| monsters to love?
Oh, don't worry about that.|!||L||wave|I love you!

leave_defect.dialog: There will be even more monsters?|L||!|I hope I can handle this.
That just means more monsters to grace with my presence.
This little one glows so brightly.
You can blind them before they even attack.

leave_twins.dialog: You know which monster Sunshine is going to kiss?

leave_devil.dialog: This is just the type of challenge I was looking for.
|wave|Are you sure you can handle this?
Are you sure you can handle |shake|THIS?
A few extra monsters is no problem for you.

leave_default.dialog: Your fate is always in your hands.
Just look at all that you've done for us already.
